article_title: Our View: Nonprofit hospitals have a community mission

article_metadata.description: Understanding health care management and the changes it brings to our region seems to get more difficult every day.Under the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act, or Obamacare, health care groups have to accommodate new, expensive mandates and regulations, despite the uncertainty swirling around the law because of congressional and legal challenges that haven’t abated in the six years since its passage.Besides that, there are business and market considerations that complicate
